blogs.title: Cindy I-Fen Cheng, “Citizens of Asian America: Democracy and Race during the Cold War”
blogs.summary:
Cindy I-Fen Cheng is the author of Citizens of Asian America: Democracy and Race during the Cold War (NYU Press 2013). She is associate professor of history and Asian American studies at the University of Wisconsin-Madison.
